channel.title: [New Development] Bubbler
channel.description:
[img]http://bubbler.site88.net/img/title.png[/img] [b]Welcome to the Bubbler Server Development Page,[/b] for the latest news and announcements please go to the [url=http://www.bubbler.site88.net]site.[/url] website development: 5% [size=8pt][i]I am currently coding this server by myself and would be very grateful if people can help me with this project.[/i][/size] [b]About[/b] This is a 2007/2008 remake and will have all the things that Runescape once had, even the little ones. If you would like to join the development team please click here. [b]*Done *Started *Not Started[/b] [b]Server Development and Updates[/b] [b]Misc[/b] [code] June 16 - Correct Teleports June 16 - Correct Running June 16 - Correct death timing June 16 - Added better eating June 15 - Added colors to text-box June 15 - Added Mod Yell June 15 - Added Announcement Yell June 15 - Created 2 class files to handle Crafting and Herblore (as of right now) [/code] [b]Skills:[/b]
[b]Herblore - 50%[/b] 100% - All Identifying Herbs 0% - Making Potions [b]Crafting 35%[/b] 100% - Gem Cutting 40% - Jewelry Making 0% - Leather Crafting 0% - Strings
PICS COMING SOON

item.title: [New Development] Bubbler
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

Bubbler:

i made it so theres nothing on it, its just so i have proof im working on stuff, as u can see theres no links on it that work

do that on the RS2 server advertisement board they will let you post your link over there without approval now make sure you follow there rules though

OT. Gl on your project

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Bubbler:

i made it so theres nothing on it, its just so i have proof im working on stuff, as u can see theres no links on it that work

I still believe that is against the rules, post in the approval board and get the link approved.

item.description:

Bubbler:

Thanks adding a lot of features

Was your website approved? If it wasn’t you should remove it before someone infracts you.

item.title: [New Development] Bubbler
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Ah, nice.

I’ve currently got a development team working on our own base for a 317 2006 F2P remake, we’re gonna be loading all the content through an API, so that’ll be a cool first for RSPS.

Anyways, good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: [New Development] Bubbler
item.dc:creator: @Bubbler Bubbler
item.description:
@Bubbler wrote:

2007 remake, As close to Old Runescape as possible with not too high exp rates, I want to make it hard for people, I’m also using a clean source too.

Read full topic

item.title: [New Development] Bubbler
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Bubbler, post:1, topic:445306”]Welcome to the Bubbler Server Development Page,
I am currently coding this server by myself and would be very grateful if people can help me with this project.

Server Development and Updates
Skills:

Herblore - 50%
100% - All Identifying Herbs
0% - Making Potions

PICS COMING SOON[/quote]

If you’d like a development team, post in the development teams board following this. layout and you should get one soon.

Also, what are your plans for this development?

Read full topic

item.title: [New Development] Bubbler
item.dc:creator: @Bubbler Bubbler
item.description:
@Bubbler wrote:


Welcome to the Bubbler Server Development Page,
for the latest news and announcements please go to the site.
website development: 5%
[size=8pt]I am currently coding this server by myself and would be very grateful if people can help me with this project.[/size]

About
This is a 2007/2008 remake and will have all the things that Runescape once had, even the little ones.
If you would like to join the development team please click here.

*Done
*Started
*Not Started

Server Development and Updates
Misc

June 16 - Correct Teleports
June 16 - Correct Running
June 16 - Correct death timing
June 16 - Added better eating
June 15 - Added colors to text-box
June 15 - Added Mod Yell
June 15 - Added Announcement Yell
June 15 - Created 2 class files to handle Crafting and Herblore (as of right now)

Skills:

[b]Herblore - 50%[/b] 100% - All Identifying Herbs 0% - Making Potions

Crafting 35%
100% - Gem Cutting
40% - Jewelry Making
0% - Leather Crafting
0% - Strings

PICS COMING SOON
